examples.example: 他常常面带微笑，给身边的人带来温暖和欢乐。

translate.english: He often has a smile on his face, bringing warmth and joy to the people around him.

examples.example: 我常常在闲暇时阅读书籍，从中汲取知识和乐趣。

translate.english: I often read books in my spare time and draw knowledge and pleasure from them.

examples.example: 我常常在公园里锻炼身体，享受着大自然的美好。

translate.english: I often exercise in the park and enjoy the beauty of nature.
